name: Rhythm OwO
description:
A game made for Mini Jam 20. 

Theme: Music

Limitation: OwO

Choose a character, and bounce your way though a horde of spikes! Collect coins to improve your score! Time your space bar presses with the drum to jump super high!

Controlls:

Use the arrow keys to navigate the menu

Use the space bar to accept

Credits:

KingW- Programming, Art

BlazeBytes- Sound

MeViPortal- Sound
